wikipedia_page.main: Robert Dilworth Etherington (19 June 1899 – 1981) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Manchester City and Rotherham United.He also played for Halifax Town, Hurst, Mexborough Athletic, Manchester North End and Chester City, and was signed by Mossley from Crexe Alexandra in the 1928–29 season, where he made two appearances.
